content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Emilia. However, discussing specific pricing details requires us to establish a private conversation where I can ensure negotiating from a position of advantage. Should you still be keen on the property, please contact me directly at an alternate method, such as email or phone. This platform doesn't allow me to maintain my usual tactics. Once we engage privately, I'll be delighted to discuss the rental price with you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mrs. Müller, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I offer the apartment for 1000 Euro per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I regret to say but your proposed rental price does not align with my investment strategy and property valuation. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I seek a higher return on investment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
